description:
Handa-kun has proven that he has an unusual charm attracting various people to him, including those he may not want to be associated with...
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Handa et Handa / Handa et la jalousie féminine / Handa et les relations sociales
Handa-kun and Handa-kun? / Handa-kun and a Girl`s Jealousy / Handa-kun and Sociability
Handa-kun to Handa-kun? / Handa-kun to Onna no Shitto / Handa-kun to Shakousei
半田くんと半田くん? / 半田くんと女の嫉妬 / 半田くんと社交性
